Use the `options` object to control dynamic behavior. Example: Display an element when max row count is 10: <div ng-if="options.maxRowCount === 10"></div> The `skeleton-container` class is used for loading placeholders. --> <div class="skeleton-container"> <!-- Header Skeleton --> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-header"></div> <!-- Body Skeleton --> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-line"></div> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-line small"></div> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-line medium"></div> </div>falsemd99fc40da97a9fad0ec453b90f053afe48679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4fsp_instanceadmin2025-12-03 07:18:1659fc40da97a9fad0ec453b90f053afe80992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4b992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4bsp_instance_59fc40da97a9fad0ec453b90f053afe8admin2025-12-03 07:18:16<url/><widget_parameters><![CDATA[{ "html": { "value": "<style> .aayos-card-link { display: block; text-decoration: none; color: inherit; } .aayos-card { position: relative; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; min-height: 210px; background-size: cover; background-position: center; box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); transition: transform .18s ease, box-shadow .18s ease; margin-bottom: 30px; } /* Always-visible dark overlay */ .aayos-card__overlay { position: absolute; inset: 0; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.55); z-index: 1; } /* Gradient band – hidden by default */ .aayos-card__gradient { position: absolute; bottom: -100%; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 60%; background: linear-gradient( to top, rgba(0,200,120,0.85), rgba(0,200,120,0) ); z-index: 2; transition: bottom .35s ease-in-out; } /* Slide gradient upward on hover */ .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__gradient { bottom: 0; } .aayos-card__content { position: relative; z-index: 3; height: 100%; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; text-align: center; color: #fff; } .aayos-card__title { font-size: 26px; margin: 0 0 6px; font-weight: 700; } .aayos-card__subtitle { font-size: 15px; margin: 0; opacity: .95; } .aayos-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); box-shadow: 0 16px 28px rgba(0,0,0,0.35); } .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__title, .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__subtitle { color: #006a3a;
